description: The lexicographically earliest sequence of binary encodings of solutions satisfying the equation p_i = (1+mod(i,2))*p_{i-1} +- p_{i-2} +- p_{i-3} +- ... +- 2 + 1, where p_i is the i-th prime number.
comments: I.e. like A059873, but the encodings must be "odd", with the least significant bit set. I do not know whether this sequence can be extended infinitely.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 05 2001
